text: Joyce Sirola (October 21, 1924 - January 13, 2024) was an American actress. She played Trixie Norton on The Honeymooners. Randolph was born on October 21, 1924 in Detroit, Michigan. She was married to Richard Lincoln Charles from 1955 until his death in 1997. They had a son. She was the last living Honeymooners cast member. She was professionally known as Joyce Randolph. Randolph died in her sleep on January 13, 2024 under hospice care in New York City at the age of 99, nine months before her 100th birthday.`The Honeymooners’ actress Joyce Randolph has died at 99; played Ed Norton’s wife, Trixie. title: Joyce Randolph
